name: GeorgiaPower
0:
”Alexa ask georgia power how much i owe”
”what is my balance”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: georgia power
des: This skill allows Georgia Power customers to inquire about the customer billing phone number and contact information without having to retrieve it from web site or from directories. Responds to most common billing questions by pointing the customer to the contact phone number.It is a convenient way to have the number always handy. THIS SKILL IS NOT PROVIDED BY GEORGIA POWER
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
